{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BT |model=Home Hub |revision=2.0A |asin= |est_release_date=11/2009 |fcc_date= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6358 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL128N90TFIR2 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU121622DTP |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module=Broadcom BCM94321MP |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4321;BCM4321L; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2055 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Programmble Wideband SLIC/Codec;Silicon Labs;Si3216-FM;;1; |flags=ADSL2+, DECT, |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=BTHomeHub2-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^BTHomeHub2-[A-Z0-9]{4}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:22:69 |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|BT Home Hub 2.0 Type A}} :[http://www.modem-help.co.uk/BT/Home-Hub-2-0a-DECT-WLAN-VoIP-Gateway.html?info=1 On modem-help.co.uk] {{see also|BT Home Hub}} *[https://openwrt.org/toh/bt/homehub_v2a ''BT HomeHub 2.0 Type A'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6358KFBG @300MHz (BMIPS4350 V1.0) :RAM: ''Hynix'' HY5DU121622DTP or ''Samsung'' K4H511638D :WLAN: [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM94322MP2D BCM94322MP2D] 2T2R 802.11bgn (2.4GHz) *[https://gadgetcat.wordpress.com/2011/02/19/home-hub-3-disassembly/ ''Home Hub 2.0A/3.0A Disassembly'' on '''GadgetCat'''] (PCB images) :which would indicate the device uses a BCM4321 wireless module :(''[[Broadcom]]'' BCM94321MP3C2) w/ a 00:22:69 OUI (''[[Foxconn]]'') :[http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM94321MP BCM94321MP] or [[Broadcom BCM94322MP2D|BCM94322MP2D]] ??
The default SSID pattern for this device appears to be '''BTHomeHub2-''' :followed by 4 random upper-case letters or numbers.
===See also=== *[[ASUS O!Play HD2]] - [https://gadgetcat.wordpress.com/2011/06/25/lg-bd550-blu-ray-disc-player/ Reviews on '''GadgetCat'''] *[[ASUS O!Play Mini V2]] - [https://www.asus.com/Home-Entertainment/OPlay_Mini_V2/ PPage] *[[ASUS O!Play TV Pro]] - [https://www.asus.com/Home-Entertainment/OPlay_TV_Pro/ PPage]
